name: Minna no Joushiki-ryoku TV
summary: Minna no Joushiki Ryoku TV is a Wii video game released in 2008 by Nintendo and HAL Laboratory. It is a game that tests a person's general knowledge and has a goal of enhancing their grasp of information. There are a wide range of categories pertaining to geography, cooking, sports and more. There is an encyclopedia the player can view to gather even more information. The game is a quiz type game and whether or not you give the correct answer the game will give a good in-depth detail. Players can download even more explanations of answers by connecting to Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.
